ygData.subject: Studs and studded leather armor...
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it worth making studded leather armor?  I have never seen studded leather in any form, and I have seen websites that say studded leather has the same AC as
ygData.messageBody: Is it worth making studded leather armor? I have never seen studded leather in any form, and I have seen websites that say studded leather has the same AC as leather, and I have seen sites that say studded leather is between leather and chain. My character Cassin (Povar), is both a tailor and a smith (and not very good at either!), so I was wondering if this would be a smart endeavour.
